column4: Hey all, I switched from Kde to gnome yesterday, finally got xine working instead of the totem (:s) and now I've installed amarok, I've just watched a movie with sound - no problems but now i want to listen to some music and I can't get any sound? Is it something simple?
set the engine of amarok to esd
open gnome-volume-control and see if you need to open/unmute some channels
test your sound on gstreamer-properties and see if its all set properly
